HTTPStatus200.summary: The HTTP 200 OK success status response code indicates that the request has succeeded. A 200 response is cacheable by default.

remarks.para: The meaning of a success depends on the HTTP request method:

The successful result of a {{HTTPMethod("PUT")}} or a {{HTTPMethod("DELETE")}} is often not a 200 OK but a {{HTTPStatus("204")}} No Content (or a {{HTTPStatus("201")}} Created when the resource is uploaded for the first time).
